review: Friendly doctor and he explains what are the things need to be, the hospital is near my home only, he did give time for the consultation. only to pay the fees we have to wait for more than half an hour am totally fine with the doctor the problem is hospital reception because of that I don't recommend only to get appointment we have wait more after taking appointment meeting the doctor no waiting time, am happy with the explanation of health issue, am satisfied with the doctor's treatment, actually I had small muscle pain so I got scared that maybe it can be possible that heart-related stuff when we went there got to know its not related to heart problem.

It was a great experience, he explained to us well now problems sorted and he guided us with the right one, unnecessary did not suggest any things or wrong checkups, whatever needed that only given, It was great but there was some issue with the language. I am satisfied with the doctor's treatment got to know about the doctor from Practo. It could have been better if the connectivity with the doctor and the patient was not that good because of language problem so to explain the thing it takes a lot of time if that improve it could be great, patients can visit him he won't give fake promises we can rely on that doctor he won't take you to the wrong path whatever needed he gives that only not other extras.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I would highly recommend Dr Naga Murali, I have been referred by local MD to him, his way of explanation regarding the treatment plan and current situation is very satisfactory...most importantly preparing the patient mentally before going for the surgery is excellent...I will give him 10/10.

Met the doctor, experience was very bad, when I visited him he suggested me four different tests ***** *** *** ******** ** *** which drained my money, visited to check heart problem I took medical insurance where I got to know I don't have a heart problem but still he suggested me to three different tests where it nearly cost around Rs. 4000 and after all nothing detected he gave me some pain killers and I took that tablets ******* ******** I do have sustain problem, ** ** ****** **** ******** ****** **** *** ******** **** ** ********* ** *** *** ** *** ********* * ***** *** ******** ******* ***** **** ******** **** ** **** * ***** *** ********* *** *** ******* ** **** doctor behaviour is good I don't have comment on that and he was very patient to listen to all queries of mine, *** * ** ******* ******** ** ********* *** *** ******** * ** **** **** ******* *** *** ******* ********** * ***** **** **** ****** ** **** ** **** ** ***** ******* *** ** **** * ***** ******* ** **** I would suggest the hospital is very good it's just that whatever tests required that need to be suggested when it's not happening to go for that test if this also not happening and go for that test considering money of people *** ** ** ** *** ******* ** ***** ***** **** *** ****** **** ** ********* *** ** ***** **** ********* ** ******* ******* ** ***** **** **** **** *** ***** ******* *** ** *** ***** **** ********* ********** ** ****** ******* ** **** ** **** ** ********* *** *** **** ****** *****

I have met Dr. Naga Murli, consultation experience was very good and nice, visited for chest pain he was listening to my problems, hospital infrastructure and should be there I didn't like much, a few months back I met him for my father cardiac problem, I would like to recommend the doctor, his behaviour was very nice, we are satisfied with the doctor and his treatment

\"He is very thorough, my dad was having heart issue it recovered very soon, his behaviour is very professional, he was listening to our problems,  it was very good, am happy with the explanation of health issue everything, if anyone needs I would like to recommend the doctor.\r\n\

Doctor naga Murali available freely  but other junior doctor checked my report I thought he will see after all tests. After getting reports I asked I want to meet Dr. Murali unfortunately he left hospital. Felt so sad paid counsultation amount considering him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
1) Doctor K. Naga Murali, DM ( Interventional  Cardiologist) is an Excellent doctor for any General Medical problems and heart related issues. 
2) He will explain medical issues to the patient in a  polite manner.
3) He is polite and highly reliable.
4) I  strongly  recommend  Dr. K. Naga Murali, DM  for any type of General  medical issues apart from Heart related problems.
5) He is  generally a  best  Doctor  when  compared  to   any other  similar doctors in Hyderabad.
----------------------
Regards
Anjaneyulu B
Chief  Engineer (E& I Procurement)--******** ****  ****** ************ *** * *************************** *****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Naga Murali is very much experienced and efficient Cardiologist and very good at understanding the patients problem and diagnose the problem with care. He has given on time treatment to my father in law and saved him. I recommend him any kind of heart problems. Thanks.

Consulted Dr Murali sir for my mother who felt heartpain and shortness of breath. Quick advise and medical remedies of Dr Murali sir  helped us to rule out the cardiac problems. Thank a lot to Dr Murali sir for the timely treatment.

review: No comments. Everything going good.no waiting time & friendly explanation . Money wise also reasonable.I satisfied for the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The Doctor was friendly and reassuring. The hospital was clean. The staff was helpful. Overall a good experience.
my mom had low bp for 3 days. i told them it was urgent but the doctors hasn't  at all. we waited for 1 and half hour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We went for my dad heart checkup. Dr. Listened very patiently and advised tests to rule out the exact issue. I am quite satisfied with the dr and his treatment. Gave minimal medicine apt to the problem.

He is a very nice, **** ******* visited for a general checkup, he was listening to my problems,I got to know about him online, I would like to recommend the doctor, I would give rating 10/10, he is nice and patience doctor.
I have booked appointment for 10:30 AM, but i have been kept waiting upto 11:45 AM. There is no time puntuality in the hospital.
Murali sir was very friendly. Explains about the condition in detail. His treatment was very nice. Thank you

Doctor is good, but due to so many patients he will spend less than 5 minutes with the patients. I was having questions but he was in so hurry as so many patients waiting outside. 
Not recommended if you want to discuss in detail or have questions.
There will be two staff members along with doctor waiting to escort you outside and call another patient. Rs 750 for 3 or 4 minutes of consultation.
reply_text:
Sorry to hear your disappointment I don’t hesitate to spend much time if needed 
If any queries please visit again 
Thanks for your bold and genuine review
